column4: how can i install just ONE program from dapper? for example i just want to install dapper's version of evolution, so can i do: apt-get install dapper -t dapper?
dabar: i tried that using checkinstall, but when i ran evolution it said it cant run because it's using a different configuartion than my system or osmething
that's complicated by evolution having quite a few dependencies that would need to be update as well
